Articles.Content: Remake of the Top Gun intro, using a ton of wonderful mods. Now I just need a couple of years paid leave from work, and I'll finish up the rest of the film

This is hilarious.  A great kerbalised reboot for sure.

The dancing kerbal.  The kerbal falling over.  The names of the actors at the start.

Everything is coming up Kerman!

Good luck for getting the paid time off.

Peace.

That volleyball scene is going to be difficult..

Great work on this!  I loved it, especially the names!  How many Kermans we got on this film, anyway?

10 hours ago, Cetera said:

That volleyball scene is going to be difficult..

Great work on this!  I loved it, especially the names!  How many Kermans we got on this film, anyway?

Thanks! I don't exactly know how many were in play, but at most I had about a dozen running around the runway, trying not to get hit by planes.

Until I made this, I also had no idea how hard it is to land a plane when you're looking at it from a fixed position on the ground

Dang it, I'm working on a top gun project as well...

I'll try to keep stuff different, and I don't think I'm going to do the intro.

On 3/12/2016 at 7:50 PM, JTpopcorn said:

Dang it, I'm working on a top gun project as well...

I'll try to keep stuff different, and I don't think I'm going to do the intro.

I was thinking of doing the "OH excrements IT'S VIPER" dogfight, but figured a frame-by-frame intro replication would be more fun to start with  Making it ended up eating away a chunk of time though, so now I've got a nice, long backlog of to-do stuff. And besides, after seeing this guy in action, I have a desperate need to move on from Top Gun to try recreating some Star Wars scene, even if I can't hope to match his skill level... https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oOagXYSCPA4

Looking forward to seeing what you end up making, hope you can post it here as well!
